descriptionProfile: SNAPCHAT and TWITTER: @elisabethrioux Owner of @HOAKA_SWIMWEAR 👙 Collab or business : elisabethrioux@live.fr 💕 BIG ANNOUNCEMENT - WE'RE PARENTS 😍
👙 Collab or business : elisabethrioux@live.fr 💕 BIG ANNOUNCEMENT - WE'RE PARENTS 😍

posts.description: Here is our little baby 😍 her name is Royce, she is a siberian husky of 2 month. We think she is mixed with a malamute but we're not sure, Royce was on a place not really legit.. They told us she was vaccinated and dewormed, we believed it since we didnt know anything about dogs, its our first one, but that day we didnt take her since we are only getting our new condo on may 25. Than my friend taught me that if she was vaccinated and dewormed, she should have a health book but the guy was like "she doesnt have it, we did the vaccine ourselves..." we called a vet and she said it is impossible, it would be possible if they were a vet but she still would have a health book. We asked many questions to the guy, the place where she was staying was a really dirty and small appartment, the guy NEVER answered our questions, he also lied to us (you will see the complete history in our next vlogs). I couldnt believe it. I was so sad for her caus she is so beautiful and if a baby puppy don't get her vaccine and is not dewormed it can literally die, it will suffer alot. We didnt want people like us who doesnt know anything to adopt her and never be warned, and then Royce would have suffer from it and also might have bring diseases to other animals.. we went directly take her, I brought her to my parents house and they accepted her, she will be in her new house with her parents (jonathan and I) on may 25 ❤️ we will be a lovely family, and then she will also have a little sister or brother, we dont know yet 💕 so this is how our family starts, hope you are not sad it's not a baby, anyway how can you be sad while looking at Royce 🙊 We are living our life steps by steps, i need to finish my university before having a human baby, but for now we have this little baby and we are more than happy to be its parents 🙏🏽

WE'RE OFFICIALLY PARENTS ❤️❤️ Yes, Jonathan came to live in Canada for a reason.. we wanted to make that big announcement with a video to explain you the all thing so I will post the video on my youtube channel SUNDAY 3pm 😭🙏🏽 The link will be in my bio 🌹 We will be happy to tell you if it's a girl or a boy 🙊
This photo has nothing to do with the caption but I wanted to tell you that my first OFFICIAL vlog is coming out on my youtube channel in 20 minutes, the link will be in my bio 🙊 wearing @pitusa.co ✨

My travel partner who's now becoming my coloc ✈️🌍😍 We will vlog every week, maybe one, 2 or 3 vlogs per week we don't know yet but our first vlog is coming out tomorrow on my youtube channel, hope you are excited as much as I am 🙏🏽

Missing this so much, which island do you think is the most beautiful in the Caribbean ? We are trying to find a new destination as cool as Aruba was with the flamingos to get some cool picture with the NEW HOAKA DESIGN (coming in around 3 weeks) 😍 @hoaka_swimwear 👙 ps : can you see the hidden flamingo 😏

Why would I mention 900k and not 899k 🤔 Thank you all for 899k ❤️😍 I was really not expecting to get there and this is because of all of you, I just cant believe in 101k I'll be at 1m, this is just.. I dont know, just thank you all, thank you for being gold and following me in my adventure with my lovely boyfriend and also my business and passion @hoaka_swimwear ✨ I'm happy I can use that 'popularity' (i dont like to talk like that 😩) to make girls better in their skin and also spead happinest and motivation 🌴🙊

Small nose, small cheeks, big lips, big eyes, on fleek eyebrows, perfect teeth, long eyelashes, strong jawline.... those are the things people are looking at on instagram, those are the things girls want because of the beauty standards at the moment. I used to look at myself and hope to have those caracteristics, probably some of you still do but I wanted to make you realise something I realised : I have big cheeks, Claudia tihan doesnt have the "perfect" smile, savannah montano has a "big" nose, alexis ren doesn't have the "perfect" eyebrows, ariana grande has small eyes, etc etc , I could name so many girls like that. If you see this as  insults, you just don't understand what I am trying to say. I want you to realise that this is the girls you (me include) look up to, they are all perfect to me and probably to you too even if they don't have all of those caracteristics so why can't you be ? The thing those girls have is : CONFIDENCE ! Confidence is the key, getting all of these caracteristic wont make you more beautiful but being confident will, trust me ✨ I read something from a girl on instagram yesterday, she will recognize herself, and it made me think about me before I realized that so I was not the only one thinking like that so I made her realize who she is and what she worth and now I want all of you to realize it 🙏🏽

Current situation (nothing about the picture 🙃) : I just landed in Canada, Jonathan is still in india, suppose to leave in 2 days but the thing is : I got his passport with me in Canada 🙂 Anyone flying to mumbai tonight or tomorrow from montreal ? 🙏🏽 i want him to come here and to Brazil so bad :(

Mumbai was such a beautiful adventure, next stop Montreal ✈️ only for 4 days caus right after we are leaving for Rio de Janeiro, Brazil 🌍 I'm so lucky to travel the world with the love of my life, really grateful about it 🙏🏽❤️

40 degrees celcius in Mumbai and I have to wear pants 🙂 but the most difficult part is to not cuddle with jonathan all day because here, it is seen like "public affection", you cannot do that in the part of mumbai where I am 🙊 I love to discover the indian culture, it's so different ✨
In 2 days I'll be on my way to see the love of my life in India, he's the reason of my happiness and I can't wait to live with him after our special event in India ❤️

Just found that old picture, makes me feel like I should workout harder, since I am working really really hard on @hoaka_swimwear I dont have time to workout as much as before 😩 I am happy with my body right now but why not having a goal again ? I want and I will to go back to this 💪🏽 watch meeeeeee (trying to get some free time to workout since my job is like a 24hours job 🙃)

My favorite thing about Hawaii is probably the people, I met the nicest people on earth and it was so easy to talk about everything and be a part of the group 🙏🏽 well the 3922 stairs to hike was worth it, look at that view 😍 stairway to heaven photo by @shangerdanger 🌍
No matter the weather I'm always smiling when you're in front of me 😍

NEW VLOG NOW AVAILABLE ON MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL ✈️✈️✈️ link in bio 💦 it's just a vlog of claudia and I being us in Hawaii ✌🏼️ I was missing this little monster 👹 can't wait to travel with all my friends and boyfriend together 🙏🏽

This is my mood right now about all the things coming in my life, this week I got the keys from the new Hoaka factory we are actually doing renovations, yesterday I officially signed everything about my new condo it's officially going to be jonathan and I new home, we will have a little puppy and a cat, in 2 weeks I am going in India with my family to visit Jonathan and go the a special event, after that Jonathan is coming to live with me in Canada 🙏🏽 I couldn't be happier about everything，I'm really grateful and I just want to make it clear with you : I wouldnt be here with out you, you are the best supporters ✈️🌍 oh and thanks to @oahuphototours for taking us to the best photo spots on the island 🐶
